detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract HCurve (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HCurve.sol#670-882) has payable functions:
	 - HandlerBase.postProcess() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HCurve.sol#244-255)
	 - HCurve.exchange(address,int256,int256,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HCurve.sol#676-689)
	 - HCurve.exchangeUnderlying(address,int256,int256,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HCurve.sol#692-711)
	 - HCurve.swap(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256[],uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HCurve.sol#714-735)
	 - HCurve.addLiquidity(address,address,uint256[],uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HCurve.sol#739-786)
	 - HCurve.addLiquidityZap(address,uint256[],uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HCurve.sol#790-836)
	 - HCurve.removeLiquidityOneCoin(address,address,uint256,int256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HCurve.sol#840-854)
	 - HCurve.removeLiquidityOneCoinZap(address,uint256,int256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HCurve.sol#860-881)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
